rca_result.root_cause: Multiple AWS service health events are active, with the most critical being Auto Scaling launch template not found and VPN redundancy loss affecting infrastructure availability
evidence: AWS_EC2_AUTOSCALING_LAUNCH_TEMPLATE_NOT_FOUND event is open - prevents new instance launches
Multiple AWS_VPN_REDUNDANCY_LOSS events indicate VPN connectivity issues
Multiple AWS_LAMBDA_PLANNED_LIFECYCLE_EVENT events suggest Lambda runtime changes
AWS_KAFKA_HIGH_RISK_CONFIG_RF_EQUALS_ONE indicates Kafka replication factor of 1

remediation.suggestion: Address Auto Scaling launch template issue and VPN redundancy loss to restore service availability
checklist: Verify Auto Scaling group configuration and recreate missing launch template
Check VPN connection status and establish redundant connections
Review Lambda function runtime versions for upcoming lifecycle changes
Increase Kafka replication factor from 1 to at least 2 for high availability
